title: RAG app using SingleStore
author: Ramananjali Mounica Golkonda
description: An easy to use and quick to run RAG application using SingleStore DB and langchain

installDependencyCommands: pip install streamlit==1.24.1 langchain==0.1.7 langchain-community==0.0.20 langchain-core==0.1.23 langchain-ibm==0.0.1 ibm-watson-machine-learning==1.0.344 ibm-watsonx-ai==0.1.5 singlestoredb==1.0.1 SQLAlchemy==2.0.1 sqlalchemy_singlestoredb==1.0.0
